name: Imperial Republicans
description:
What is this?

It's a game that you don't play but decide how the computer plays. You can set countries' attack power, defense power and wealth; can choose who controls each region and just watch which country will rule the whole world!

You don't have to set countries' stats. You can observe the world without touching anything. The game doesn't get stuck.

Click regions on the map or countries on the list to reach countries stats.

  • Rebellions:

Countries can rebel and even devastated countries can be resurrected with these uprisings. Rebellions happen completely randomly.

  • Trade Routes:

Countries on trade routes earn more money than other and smaller countries. So trade centers where multiple trade routes converge are strategically important places.

  • Harbors and Warships:

Countries use money to build harbors and warships. These harbors also help countries to earn more and more money. That means harbors are strategically very important for small countries. Smalls countries that invaded a region which is has a harbor can easily start controls the whole seashore with cheap warships. But harbors take damage when the region is invaded. Each harbor has a capacity of 30 ships.
